definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)

sentences.english: Microwave-assisted extraction(MAE)method was studied for the extraction of a natural red pigment from the pericarp of Pitaya (Hylocereus undatus Britt &Rose).
sentences.chinese: 就微波提取火龙果果皮天然红色素的工艺进行探讨。

sentences.english: The nutrition composition in the seed kernel of white pitaya was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对火龙果种仁的营养成分进行了分析。

sentences.english: He looked up and he saw a fire-breathing dragon.
sentences.chinese: 他抬头一看，他看到了喷火龙。
现在她变成了一条火龙。

sentences.english: Dragon heart string, snake nerves, dinosaur eggs and firedrake blood.
sentences.chinese: 龙心弦，蛇神经，恐龙蛋和火龙血。

sentences.english: Is firedrake fruit the fruit of cold sex or easy get angry?
sentences.chinese: 火龙果是寒性还是易上火的水果？

sentences.english: Wolf, bear, and otter, dragon, dove.
sentences.chinese: 野狼，黑熊，水獭，火龙，白鸽。

sentences.english: He will rescue Princess Fiona from a dangerous, fire-breathing dragon.
sentences.chinese: 他将从一只危险的喷火龙手里救出费欧娜公主。

sentences.english: I am received come over, have orange and firedrake fruit.
sentences.chinese: 我接过来，有橙子和火龙果。

sentences.english: Fire Dragons now correctly fire at targets within range.
sentences.chinese: 现在正确点火龙在范围里面向目标开枪。

sentences.english: Fire Dragon Exarch gets access to a heavy flamer equivelent called the Dragons Breath.
sentences.chinese: 火龙战士军官可使用龙焰枪，视为重型火焰枪。

sentences.english: He will rescue Princess Fiona from a dangerous, fire-breathing 8)dragon.
sentences.chinese: 他将从一只危险的喷火龙手里救出费欧娜公主。

sentences.english: Then on Christmas Eve of 2009, I saw this fire dragon dancing on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 在2009年圣诞夜，我见到沙滩有条火龙在舞。

sentences.english: Mother bought a Dragon Fruit. It has been left there for three days.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈买了一个火龙果，放在那里三天了。

sentences.english: Dragon also known as" Fire Dragon ", which is the most widely popular as a dragon dance.
sentences.chinese: 龙灯也称“火龙”，这是流行最为广泛的一种龙舞。

definition: a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)

Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]/(slang) man without pubic hair
